title: Starší druid
content:
Starší druid seems to be the most senior Druid in the Druidský hájek v Kapitola II. It is from the Starší druid that one can purchase a variety of items, including rostliny, knihy a svitky. V Kapitola III, this position seems to have been taken over by the Hierofant.

V Kapitola V, there are several druidové going by the title of "Starší druid" v Druidské jeskyni ze hřbitova v bažinách. They are accompanied by an Nejstarší druid and are preparing for Zelený pochod. They are interested in trading elixíry for a number of items to help with the pochod.

Starší druidové typically buy and sell the following:

nějaký knihy a svitky, notably involving rostliny
nějaký Rostliny
nějaký Jídlo
Úkoly
Strážce
Zelený pochod
